CustomField.inlineHelpText:
1. If assign to specific user, input user id. ex. 34506, 2395
2. If assign dynamic user related to customer in put formula field. ex. Customer_Owner_ID__c Customer_BRC_User__c Customer_Wealth_RM_BM__c
3. If assign to bu name in put BU Name.
CustomField.label: Responsible BU (Hop 1)
